sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Playtika (PLTK) Q4 2025 Earnings Call Transcript
feed.summary: Playtika (PLTK) reported strong Q4 2025 results, with total revenue up 4.4% year-over-year and direct-to-consumer (D2C) revenue reaching $250.1 million. The company is actively shifting its portfolio towards casual games, which now account for 74% of total revenue, driven by the exceptional performance of SuperPlay titles like Disney Solitaire. Despite a net loss due to non-cash contingent consideration for the SuperPlay earn-out, Playtika achieved record free cash flow and suspended its dividend to prioritize capital flexibility for high-return investments and the SuperPlay earn-out.

feed.title: PLDT income eases 7%; data center REIT plan under study
feed.summary: PLDT Inc.'s attributable net income decreased by 7.12% to P30.01 billion in 2025 due to higher expenses and flat core earnings. The company is now considering a real estate investment trust (REIT) listing for its data center business, VITRO, after abandoning plans to sell a minority stake, as potential investors sought majority control. Maya Group, jointly owned by PLDT and First Pacific Co. Ltd., reported its first full-year profit, with an IPO targeted for the second half of the year.

feed.title: Morgan Stanley Trims Price Target on EPAM Systems, Inc. (EPAM) to $160, Keeps Equal Weight Rating
feed.summary: Morgan Stanley has lowered its price target for EPAM Systems (EPAM) to $160 from $175, while maintaining an Equal Weight rating, following the company's Q4 earnings call and a cautious outlook for 2026. Goldman Sachs also trimmed its price target but reiterated a Buy rating, viewing the stock's slump as an overreaction. EPAM, a provider of digital and AI transformation services, has projected Q1 2026 revenue between $1.38 billion and $1.40 billion, with adjusted profit per share between $2.70 and $2.78.

feed.title: Analysts See Over 50% Upside To Booking Holdings Inc. (BKNG)
feed.summary: Booking Holdings Inc. (BKNG) is considered a Strong Buy with an average upside potential of 50.5%, according to analysts. Morgan Stanley upgraded the stock to Overweight, while Citigroup reiterated a Buy rating, citing Booking's strong Q4 performance with a 16% revenue increase and 9% rise in room nights year-over-year. The company's ability to retain customers and leverage passenger information for direct business were highlighted as key strengths.

feed.title: Netflix Just Lost the Fight for Warner Bros. It’s Still the One to Beat
feed.summary: Netflix has withdrawn its bid for Warner Bros. Discovery assets, citing "financial discipline" after Paramount Skydance made a superior all-cash offer for the entire company, including its legacy cable networks. While Netflix's proposal focused on valuable IP like HBO, Paramount is acquiring WBD's substantial debt and less valuable linear television assets. Despite losing this battle, Netflix's strategic decision to avoid taking on WBD's full debt and less desirable assets highlights its continued strength and focused approach in the streaming industry.

feed.title: Pursuit Attractions And Hospitality (PRSU) Returns To Profitability, Testing Premium Valuation Narratives
feed.summary: Pursuit Attractions and Hospitality (PRSU) has returned to profitability, reporting a trailing twelve-month net income of US$24.9 million, up from a US$150.6 million loss. Despite this, its revenue growth of 3.8% lags the broader US market, and its P/E ratio of 39.7x is significantly higher than peers and its DCF fair value. The company's premium valuation is being tested by its slower revenue growth and exposure to risks affecting high-demand destinations.

feed.title: McDonald’s Korea wraps up 2026 manager convention
feed.summary: McDonald's Korea recently concluded its 2026 Manager Convention, bringing together 1,400 managers from 400 restaurants nationwide. The event, held in three sessions throughout February, aimed to recognize managers' efforts, strengthen organizational solidarity, and boost morale through various programs and discussions on operational priorities. The company emphasizes its people-centered management philosophy by investing in employee development and promoting internal mobility, with about half of its headquarters staff having started their careers in restaurants.

feed.title: Perimeter Solutions (PRM) Q4 Loss Concentration Reinforces Bearish Profitability Narratives
feed.summary: Perimeter Solutions (PRM) reported its FY 2025 results, showing a Q4 revenue of US$102.8 million and a basic EPS loss of US$0.94. The company remains unprofitable on a trailing 12-month basis with a net income loss of US$206.4 million, heavily concentrated in Q4 2025 which saw a US$140.2 million loss. Despite a forecasted revenue growth of 11.9% per year, the stock trades at a premium P/S of 5.3x compared to industry averages, raising questions about its valuation amidst ongoing losses.

feed.title: Phathom Pharmaceuticals (PHAT) Losses Narrow To US$0.29 EPS And Test Bullish Profitability Narrative
feed.summary: Phathom Pharmaceuticals (PHAT) reported Q4 2025 revenue of US$57.6 million and a narrowed basic EPS loss of US$0.29, with a net loss of US$21.1 million. While revenue growth is strong, trailing 12-month net losses remain substantial at US$221.25 million, raising questions about the company's path to profitability and challenging the bullish narrative that anticipates 25.4% margins within three years. Despite the narrowing quarterly losses, the overall financial health, including negative shareholders' equity, indicates that profitability is still a significant work in progress.

feed.title: Telstra, Ericsson and Qualcomm Achieve 682 Mbps 5G Uplink
feed.summary: Telstra, Ericsson, and Qualcomm have achieved a new global 5G Standalone uplink speed record of 682 Mbps on Telstra's live commercial network in Queensland, Australia. This significant increase from 516 Mbps in February 2025 will enhance consumer experiences such as faster uploads, more reliable live streaming, and more responsive real-time applications, particularly during peak times. The advancement leverages Ericsson's 5G Advanced Uplink Transmit Switching features, Telstra's mid-band 5G spectrum, and Qualcomm's X85 5G Modem-RF platform.

feed.title: Derek Stark Sells 1,903 Shares of PennyMac Financial Services (NYSE:PFSI) Stock
feed.summary: Derek Stark, an insider at PennyMac Financial Services (NYSE:PFSI), sold 1,903 shares of the company's stock for a total of $174,124.50, reducing his holding by 7.81%. This sale occurred shortly after PennyMac missed its quarterly earnings and revenue estimates. Despite the earnings miss and a "Hold" average analyst rating, the company announced a quarterly dividend of $0.30 per share.

feed.title: Eversource Energy: What Wall Street Missed About This Quiet Utility
feed.summary: Eversource Energy, a utility serving over 4 million customers in New England, is undergoing a significant transition towards cleaner energy, grid modernization, and facing regulatory challenges. This pivot involves substantial investments in infrastructure hardening against extreme weather and integrating renewables, particularly offshore wind. While this aims to improve reliability and promote clean power, it also leads to increased costs for consumers and balancing acts for regulators, impacting both customer bills and investor perceptions of the stock's stability.

feed.title: Analysts Offer Insights on Industrial Goods Companies: Lennox International (LII) and Deere (DE)
feed.summary: Analysts have issued neutral ratings for Lennox International (LII) and Deere (DE), indicating neither bullish nor bearish sentiment on these industrial goods stocks. RBC Capital's Deane Dray maintained a Hold rating on Lennox International with a $587.00 price target, while Bernstein's Chad Dillard also maintained a Hold rating on Deere with a $615.00 price target. Both companies received downgrades to Hold from TipRanks – OpenAI.

feed.title: Xcel Energy asks for two rate hikes in Colorado; some customers say they're fed up
feed.summary: Xcel Energy is seeking approval from the Public Utility Commission for proposed rate increases: nearly 10% for electricity and 11% for gas, citing infrastructure investments. This has led to protests from customers who argue that the company's substantial profits should cover these costs without further burdening ratepayers. Xcel Energy, however, maintains that these investments are crucial for clean, reliable, and safe energy delivery, emphasizing their commitment to balancing reliability, sustainability, and affordability.

feed.title: Is Uber Technologies Stock Underperforming the Nasdaq?
feed.summary: Uber Technologies (UBER) has underperformed the Nasdaq Composite (NASX) across several timeframes, including the past three months, year-to-date, and the past 52 weeks. The company's shares dropped after forecasting Q1 2026 gross bookings and adjusted core profit below expectations, despite beating revenue estimates in Q4 2025. Despite this underperformance, analysts maintain a "Strong Buy" consensus rating for UBER, with a significant upside potential from current price levels.

feed.title: Cathie Wood Seeing AI Gold In Amazon And Baidu? Ark Invest Is Betting On These Stocks Today
feed.summary: Ark Invest, led by Cathie Wood, made significant trades on Thursday, increasing its holdings in Amazon.com Inc. and Baidu Inc., while reducing its stake in Salesforce Inc. The firm purchased Amazon shares despite a stock decline, citing BofA Securities' optimistic outlook on AWS's AI-driven growth. Ark Invest also acquired a substantial amount of Baidu stock across multiple funds, as the Chinese tech giant continues to invest heavily in AI despite a recent revenue decline.

feed.title: Milwaukee joins other municipalities in suing fire truck manufacturers
feed.summary: The City of Milwaukee has filed a lawsuit against three fire truck manufacturers—REV Group, Oshkosh Corp., and Rosenbauer America—accusing them of colluding to inflate prices and limit supply. This action joins a federal class-action lawsuit initiated by the City of La Crosse, alleging that these companies used the Fire Apparatus Manufacturers' Association to facilitate anticompetitive practices. Milwaukee city officials emphasize that taxpayers bear the burden of these increased costs for essential emergency equipment, and the litigation aims to ensure fair competition and protect public safety.

feed.title: OPEN - Opendoor Technologies Inc Latest Stock News & Market Updates
feed.summary: This page provides the latest news and updates for Opendoor Technologies Inc. (Nasdaq: OPEN), an e-commerce platform for residential real estate transactions. It includes company press releases, earnings communications, and regulatory updates, highlighting leadership changes, financial results, strategic objectives, and shareholder programs such as special dividends and warrant distributions. The company is actively focusing on AI integration and pursuing a path to profitability.

feed.title: NOVONIX Seeks ASX Quotation for Over 1 Million New Shares
feed.summary: NOVONIX Ltd (AU:NVX) has applied to the ASX for the quotation of 1,008,567 new ordinary fully paid shares, scheduled for issuance and quotation on February 27, 2026. This modest share issuance aims to expand the company's capital base and may slightly improve liquidity for shareholders, indicating continued engagement with equity markets as NOVONIX advances its battery materials and technology business. While the issuance is small, it supports operational and growth objectives without significantly altering the capital structure, coinciding with a recent analyst "Sell" rating and a A$0.36 price target.

feed.title: Tractor Supply celebrates with grand opening, ribbon cutting in Copperas Cove
feed.summary: Tractor Supply celebrated the grand opening of its newest store in Copperas Cove with a ribbon-cutting ceremony. The event was attended by local officials, including Mayor Dan Yancey, and company representatives, who expressed excitement about joining the community and highlighted partnerships with Hometown Heroes, FFA, and 4H programs. The new store, managed by Daniel Avila, is located at 917 W. Business 190, created about 15 new jobs, and received a development grant from the Copperas Cove EDC for infrastructure.

feed.title: Dominion Energy calls for continued federal aid for struggling households
feed.summary: Dominion Energy representatives met with federal lawmakers in Washington to advocate for continued funding for the Low-Income Home Energy Assistance Program (LIHEAP). They highlighted the importance of LIHEAP in helping vulnerable households cope with rising energy costs, especially during severe weather. Dominion Energy also encouraged customers to explore other available support options like EnergyShare and various payment plans.

feed.title: Inside the secretive data centers powering the AI boom
feed.summary: The article explores the secretive world of data centers, crucial for powering the AI boom. Scripps News gained rare access to Digital Realty's Dallas campus, highlighting the stringent security, massive scale, and energy demands of these facilities. Demand for data centers is projected to triple by 2030, raising major questions about energy use and sustainability.

feed.title: Sempra Energy (NYSE:SRE) Raises Dividend to $0.66 Per Share
feed.summary: Sempra Energy (NYSE:SRE) has increased its quarterly dividend to $0.6575 per share, marking the 22nd consecutive year of dividend increases for the utilities provider. The company's Q4 earnings beat analyst EPS estimates ($1.28 vs. $1.12) but revenue missed expectations, while management also boosted its five-year capital spending plan and raised its 2030 EPS outlook, contributing to a slight increase in stock price. Analysts such as Morgan Stanley maintain a positive outlook on the stock.

feed.title: Has The Market Run Too Far On Bank of New York Mellon Corporation (BK) After 43% One-Year Gain?
feed.summary: This article analyzes Bank of New York Mellon Corporation (BK) after its significant 43% one-year gain, using two valuation approaches. While the Excess Returns model suggests the stock is slightly overvalued at US$121.61 compared to its intrinsic value of US$111.90, the Price vs Earnings approach indicates it is slightly undervalued compared to Simply Wall St's Fair Ratio. The article encourages investors to use "Narratives" on its platform to personalize valuation based on their own assumptions about the company's future.

feed.title: Fresh Bond Issuance And Analyst Upgrades Might Change The Case For Investing In U.S. Bancorp (USB)
feed.summary: U.S. Bancorp recently issued over US$80 million in long-dated bonds and received positive analyst upgrades following stronger-than-expected Q4 2025 earnings. This has shifted sentiment around the company, reinforcing its funding flexibility and highlighting improved operational performance. Despite these positive developments, investors are cautioned to consider ongoing growth challenges, insider selling, and rising cybersecurity threats.

feed.title: How Elevance Health Is — and Isn’t — Using AI
feed.summary: Elevance Health is leveraging AI to streamline various operations like prior authorizations, claims processing, and member support, while crucially maintaining human oversight for all denial decisions. The company emphasizes a responsible AI approach, with a governance program aligned with the NIST framework, and collaborates with Big Tech and healthcare AI startups to integrate real-world healthcare complexities into AI development. Ratnakar Lavu, Elevance Health's chief digital information officer, highlights their commitment to balancing innovation with safety and trust in AI deployment.

feed.title: MGM Resorts Partnering with Flavor Flav on Las Vegas Women’s Hockey Team Bash
feed.summary: MGM Resorts International announced its partnership with rapper Flavor Flav to co-host a celebration in Las Vegas for the victorious U.S. women's Olympic hockey team. The "She Got Game" event, scheduled for July 16-19, will honor the team after they declined a White House invitation and will include accommodations, a parade, and a concert. Flavor Flav also launched a GoFundMe campaign to provide "victory bonuses" directly to the athletes, which has already raised over $34,000.

feed.title: Western Digital (WDC) Valuation Check After Strong Recent Share Price Momentum
feed.summary: Western Digital (WDC) has experienced a significant 73% share price increase over the last three months, prompting a re-evaluation of its current valuation. Despite this momentum, a common narrative suggests the stock is 51% overvalued, with a fair value estimated around $187 per share compared to its trading price of $282.25. While its P/E ratio of 24.3x is below the peer average, suggesting some market caution, investors are encouraged to consider potential risks, rewards, and alternative investment opportunities.

feed.title: Bleichroeder Acquisition Corp. I (NASDAQ:BACQ) Major Shareholder Goldman Sachs Group Inc Sells 4,444 Shares
feed.summary: Goldman Sachs Group Inc. has reduced its stake in Bleichroeder Acquisition Corp. I (NASDAQ:BACQ) by selling 4,444 shares on December 5th for $47,995.20, decreasing its ownership by 0.14%. Despite other minor transactions, including both buys and sells, the overall activity indicates a slight net reduction in Goldman Sachs's holdings. The article also notes BACQ's recent trading performance, simple moving averages, 52-week range, and a reaffirmed "Sell" rating from Weiss Ratings.

feed.title: Insider Sell: Mark Mouadeb Sells Shares of Capital One Financial Corp
feed.summary: Mark Mouadeb, President, Card at Capital One Financial Corp (COF), sold 1,509 shares of the company on February 25, 2026. This transaction follows a period where there have been no insider buys and 24 insider sells for COF in the past year. The stock is currently trading at $202.62, and with a GuruFocus Value of $144.24, it is considered significantly overvalued.

feed.title: Insider Sell Alert: Holly Kriendler Sells Shares of Oceaneering International Inc (OII)
feed.summary: Holly Kriendler, Senior Vice President and Chief Human Resources Officer at Oceaneering International Inc (OII), sold 24,805 shares of the company on February 26, 2026. This transaction leaves her with 24,702 shares. Oceaneering International Inc is currently trading at $37.63, with a price-to-GF-Value ratio of 1.47, indicating it is significantly overvalued according to GuruFocus's intrinsic value estimate.

feed.title: Axon Enterprise Inc (AXON) CEO Patrick Smith Sells 10,000 Shares
feed.summary: Axon Enterprise Inc CEO Patrick Smith sold 10,000 shares of the company on February 25, 2026. This transaction reduces his total holdings to 3,090,997 shares. Over the past year, Smith has sold 80,000 shares with no purchases, while the company has seen 1 insider buy and 40 insider sells. The stock is currently trading at $500.24 and is considered fairly valued according to GuruFocus's GF Value.

feed.title: Insider Sell: Michael Sondel Sells Shares of Analog Devices Inc (ADI)
feed.summary: Michael Sondel, Chief Accounting Officer of Analog Devices Inc (ADI), sold 4,199 shares of the company on February 25, 2026. This transaction is part of a trend of insider selling at ADI, with 38 insider sells and no buys over the past year. The stock is currently trading at $361.03, with a high price-to-earnings ratio and is considered significantly overvalued according to GuruFocus's GF Value.

feed.title: Extra Space Storage outlines vehicle unit requirements with 10x20 standard for cars
feed.summary: Extra Space Storage has issued detailed guidance on appropriate storage unit sizes for different types of vehicles. According to the company, a 10x20 unit is generally suitable for standard cars, SUVs, and most trucks. They also recommend smaller 10x15 units for compact cars and larger 10x25 or 10x30 units for big vehicles like F-150s, emphasizing the importance of careful measurement.

feed.title: Sherwin-Williams’ Hinckley flex space
feed.summary: Sherwin-Williams (SHW) is facing an overflow issue at its new headquarters in downtown Cleveland, which was completed in 2024. The company is now assessing employee occupancy to make further facility decisions. This article highlights the initial situation of their new HQ overflowing, hinting at future space management strategies.

feed.title: Novavax (NVAX) Turns Profitable With US$440 Million TTM Net Income Challenging Bearish Views
feed.summary: Novavax (NVAX) has become profitable in FY 2025, reporting a trailing 12-month net income of US$440.3 million and a P/E ratio of 4.1x. Despite this profitability, analysts forecast revenue and earnings to decline by approximately 30.7% and 48.3% per year respectively over the next three years, raising concerns about its financial stability due to negative shareholder equity and weak debt coverage. The article highlights a tension between the company's recent profitability and bearish analyst forecasts, suggesting a need for investors to carefully evaluate both the bullish and bearish narratives.

feed.title: Will S&P Global’s (SPGI) Private Debt Index Push Deepen Its Data Moat and Earnings Quality?
feed.summary: S&P Global (SPGI) recently reported strong quarterly results and launched new indices for private senior debt, expanding its reach into the private loan market. This move is expected to bolster S&P Global’s data moat and earnings quality by diversifying its revenue streams beyond public debt and equity issuance, potentially offsetting cyclicality. Investors are encouraged to assess the impact of this expansion on future earnings stability and consider various valuation assumptions.

feed.title: Partners Unveil Plan for Outdoor Amphitheater on The Riverfront in Cleveland
feed.summary: Bedrock and Rock Entertainment Group, in partnership with Live Nation, plan to build and operate a new 6,200-seat outdoor amphitheater on The Riverfront in downtown Cleveland. This venue is expected to host a variety of concerts and festivals, attracting visitors, generating an annual economic impact of $59 million, and reinforcing Cleveland's reputation as a top music city. The project is part of a larger initiative to revitalize the Cuyahoga River waterfront and connect it with downtown Cleveland.

feed.title: Insider Selling: Vertex Pharmaceuticals (NASDAQ:VRTX) EVP Sells 1,846 Shares of Stock
feed.summary: Vertex Pharmaceuticals (NASDAQ:VRTX) Executive Vice President Amit Sachdev sold 1,846 shares of the company's stock for approximately $897,802 on February 25th, reducing his stake by 3.22%. This sale was part of a larger cluster of insider disposals totaling about $4.6 million, which led to a slight dip in VRTX stock. Despite the insider selling, analysts maintain a "Moderate Buy" rating with a consensus price target of $542, supported by solid Q4 revenue growth of 9.5%.

feed.title: Engine Capital Management, Lp Acquires 124,797 Shares of Orthofix Medical (NASDAQ:OFIX) Stock
feed.summary: Engine Capital Management, LP increased its stake in Orthofix Medical (NASDAQ:OFIX) by purchasing 124,797 shares on February 24th and an additional 13,061 shares on February 25th, bringing its total ownership to 3,663,133 shares valued at approximately $46 million. This acquisition increased their holding by 3.53%. The company recently reported an earnings miss with an EPS of -$0.06 against an expected $0.44, and analysts forecast an average "Hold" rating for the stock with a target price of $18.25.

feed.title: Packaging Corp (NYSE: PKG) president receives 11,719-share RSU stock award
feed.summary: Thomas A. Hassfurther, President of Packaging Corp of America (NYSE: PKG), was awarded 11,719 restricted stock units (RSUs) on February 25, 2026, as reported in a Form 4 SEC filing. This grant, valued at $0.00 per unit, is a stock-based compensation and not a market purchase. Following this award, Hassfurther directly holds 204,265 shares of common stock, with additional indirect holdings through a 401(k) plan, his spouse, and an investment entity.

feed.title: Insider Sell: Rohit Grover Sells Shares of The Hershey Co (HSY)
feed.summary: Rohit Grover, President, International of The Hershey Co (HSY), sold 3,500 shares of the company on February 24, 2026, reducing his total ownership to 34,568 shares. This sale is part of a trend over the past year with more insider sells than buys for HSY. The stock was trading at $226.07, indicating it is fairly valued according to GuruFocus's GF Value, despite having a higher P/E ratio than the industry median.

feed.title: QDTE ETF: All This Work, For No Reason - Strong Sell (BATS:QDTE)
feed.summary: The article rates the Roundhill Innovation 100 0DTE Covered Call Strategy ETF (QDTE) as a strong sell. It argues that QDTE underperforms simply holding QQQ due to capped upside and high fees (0.97% expense ratio), especially in a strong tech bull market. Investors seeking tech growth are advised to choose low-cost, uncapped Nasdaq 100 exposure like QQQ instead of QDTE.

feed.title: Palvella Therapeutics Announces Underwritten Common Stock Offering
feed.summary: Palvella Therapeutics has announced an underwritten public offering of 1,600,000 shares of common stock at $125.00 per share, aiming to raise approximately $187.3 million in net proceeds. The company plans to use these funds to advance its QTORIN rapamycin and QTORIN pitavastatin programs and for general corporate purposes. Despite a "Neutral" rating from TipRanks’ AI Analyst Spark due to weak financial performance, the stock carries a "Buy" rating from traditional analysts with a $210.00 price target.

feed.title: Forex Signals Feb 26: Berkshire, SQM, Frontline and Pearson Earnings Preview
feed.summary: This article provides an earnings preview for major companies like Berkshire Hathaway, SQM, Frontline, and Pearson, highlighting their financial positions and key focus areas for investors. It also discusses recent market movements, including Nvidia's stock drop despite strong earnings, volatility in forex markets, and the latest on gold and cryptocurrency prices. The report emphasizes the importance of future guidance over past results for investors.

feed.title: The Pennant Group Q4 Earnings Beat Estimates, Shows Strong Growth - News and Statistics
feed.summary: The Pennant Group reported strong Q4 results, surpassing revenue and adjusted earnings per share estimates, and achieving record annual performance. The company's long-term growth trends demonstrate sustained customer appeal and accelerated revenue growth, partly due to pricing adjustments. While full-year revenue aligns with analyst projections, next year's EBITDA guidance is below current expectations.

feed.title: Thomas Powell Sells 1,159 Shares of Powell Industries (NASDAQ:POWL) Stock
feed.summary: Thomas Powell, a major shareholder in Powell Industries (NASDAQ:POWL), sold 1,159 shares for approximately $650,709, reducing his stake by 0.18% but still holding 650,790 shares valued at about $365.38 million. The company recently reported strong quarterly EPS of $3.40, exceeding estimates, and increased its quarterly dividend to $0.27 per share. Despite the sale and a slight dip in stock price, analysts maintain a "Moderate Buy" rating with an average target price of $415.50.

feed.title: Powell Industries (NASDAQ:POWL) Major Shareholder Sells $178,197.66 in Stock
feed.summary: Thomas Powell, a major shareholder in Powell Industries (NASDAQ:POWL), sold 318 shares worth $178,197.66 on February 25th, reducing his stake by 0.05% to 650,472 shares. This transaction follows the company's recent earnings report, where it beat EPS estimates but slightly missed revenue forecasts. Powell Industries also announced a quarterly dividend of $0.27 per share.

feed.title: PROCEPT BioRobotics (PRCT) Quarterly Loss Deepens Challenging Bullish Margin Expansion Narrative
feed.summary: PROCEPT BioRobotics reported its Q4 FY 2025 results with increased revenue but also a deepened quarterly loss, challenging the narrative of bullish margin expansion. The company's stock trades at a premium P/S multiple compared to its industry peers, despite consistently reporting losses and not being expected to reach profitability within the next three years. This situation creates tension between growth expectations and the current reality of ongoing significant losses for investors.

feed.title: Latham & Watkins Advises Phillips Edison & Company in US$350 Million of Senior Unsecured Notes Offering
feed.summary: Latham & Watkins LLP advised Phillips Edison & Company (PECO), a major owner and operator of grocery-anchored shopping centers, in its US$350 million public offering of 4.750% senior unsecured notes due 2033. The notes were priced at 99.920% of the principal amount and are fully guaranteed by PECO. The Latham & Watkins corporate team was led by partners Lewis Kneib and Julian Kleindorfer, with tax advice provided by partner Eric Cho.
